product: ARForms - Premium WordPress Form Builder Plugin for WordPress
shortDescription: The ARForms - Premium WordPress Form Builder Plugin WordPress plugin before 6.6 allows unauthenticated users to modify uploaded files in such a way that PHP code can be uploaded when an upload file input is included on a form.
vulnerabilityName: ARForms - Premium WordPress Form Builder Plugin for WordPress PHP Code Upload Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
